name: Canvas Component Deselect Requested

movements.name: Route Deselection

beats.title: Route Deselection Request
beats.userStory: As an engineer, I need `routeDeselectionRequest` to identify current selection and clear state.

then: it performs its expected orchestration logic
and: emits expected side effects or returns expected value

movements.userStory: As an interaction designer, I need requested deselect to route to base and clear selection consistently.
movements.businessValue: Enables reliable operations with measurable KPIs; ensures consistent service delivery with SLA compliance (target: 99.9%)
